meanings: 식사 중의 표현 Don't eat so quickly.
초대와 방문 Something suddenly came up.
초대와 방문 Something came up all of a sudden.

vlive.english: Right, it was a urgent sponsor!

vlive.korean: 뭐야 말도 없이 이렇게 급하게 간다고?

examples.english: The words came out in a rush.

examples.korean: 급하게 결혼하고, 시간 날 때 후회한다. (서양속담, 남녀속담)
examples.english: Marry in haste, repent at leisure.

examples.korean: 한번은 제가 급하게 유망 고객에게 구매 권유를 해야 했던 일이 있었습니다.
examples.english: I once had to give a sales pitch to a prospective client on very short notice.

examples.korean: 급하게 알려줘서 정말 미안한데 진짜 급한 일이 생겨서 오늘 취소해야 할 것 같아.
examples.english: I’m terribly sorry for the short notice, but I’m gonna have to cancel today because something really urgent has come up.
fling oneself into the water[one's clothes]
